name: Watermelon Go
description:
The game is very easy to play just tap on screen you can play with one hand.

You control Watermelon jumps by tapping on screen to collect all slice placed on map on display you have score and highscore for keep track your record of play.

Make the Watermelon happy by passing the levels and collecting more slice you can manage on speed with Watermelon is going foward and try to avoid the enemy like: crow, duck, spikes, poison fish, hedgehog with you don't want to make the watermelon upset.

The game support Language:English, Română, Rусский.

Enjoy the game.
